name: 3P BIOPHARMACEUTICALS, S.L.
goal:
3P Biopharmaceuticals is a European-based Contract Development and Manufacturing Organization (CDMO) specialized in the process development and GMP manufacture of biopharmaceutical and cell therapy products from early stages (POC,PC) up to clinical and commercial.

The Company offers an integral service for the process development and manufacture of biopharmaceutical products from:

Microbial fermentation
Mammalian cell culture
interests: Development, Public Health, Research and Technology
euInitiatives:
-Bioeconomy
-H2020
-Pharmaceuticals in the environment
-Eu trade policy
-Industrial policy
-Acces to innovation
